official_title: Resolution disapproving the alternative plan, dated August 31, 1974, for pay adjustments for Federal employees under statutory pay systems transmitted by the President to Congress.

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives disapproves the alternative plan, dated August 31, 1974, for pay adjustments for Federal employees under statutory pay systems transmitted by the President to Congress.
